data.title: Lorraine Toussaint
data.text:
Born: 4-Apr-1960

Birthplace: Trinidad

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: Black

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Renée Jackson on Any Day Now

Mother: Janet Beane (d. 1999)

High School: High School of Performing Arts, New York, NY (1978)

University: Juilliard School of Drama

TELEVISION

Rosewood Donna Rosewood (2015-)

Orange Is the New Black Yvonne Parker (2014)

Body of Proof Chief Angela Martin (2013)

The Young and the Restless Dr. Watkins (2012-14)

Friday Night Lights Bird Merriweather (2009-11)

Saving Grace Capt. Kate Perry (2007-10)

Ugly Betty Yoga (2007)

Threat Matrix Carina Wright (2003)

Law & Order Shambala Green (1990-2003)

Crossing Jordan Dr. Elaine Duchamps (2002-03)

Any Day Now Renée Jackson (1998-2002)

Where I Live Marie St. Martin (1993)
